projects.title: Task Management Dashboard
projects.description: A productivity application for organizing tasks and lists. Features full CRUD capabilities (Create, Read, Update, Delete) and utilizes a custom JSON-server API for data persistence.

projects.title: Interactive Blog Platform
projects.description: A dynamic content management system allowing users to publish and manage blog posts. Implements complex state management for real-time post updates and deletion.

projects.title: Professional Portfolio
projects.description: A modern, dark-themed portfolio website designed to showcase engineering projects. Built with a focus on component reusability, responsive design, and modern UI/UX principles.
